author: Yoko Kubota
title: Apple’s China Lesson: Think Different, But Not Too Different - WSJ
text:
BEIJING—Apple Inc. Chief Executive Tim Cook will co-chair the Chinese government’s showcase global business forum next month, underscoring his increasingly high profile here as Apple and other companies wrestle with tough new government demands on cybersecurity.
In helping lead the China Development Forum in March, Mr. Cook would be making his fifth appearance at a newsmaking event in China in little over a year. The development forum is a sought-after venue for the world’s business elite due to the rare access it offers to...
